channel.title: Responsive Setup :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: In web development, Responsive Design means making your webpages adjust to the device they are displayed on. This is especially important today, where a user might be browsing the web from a desktop, a tablet, a phone, or even a console built into a refrigerator, a car, or an airplane seat! Before we go farther, there are a couple of concepts we need to understand. The first is the device width and device height, which are the actual size of the deviceâ€™s screen.
